title: Cafe R.E.D.
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Guatemalan, Latin, South American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A social enterprise restaurant and cultural center. Menu specifically lists vegetarian choices, of which a few may be requested vegan. Also a few dishes with meat can be made vegetarian such as nachos omit meat and cheese and substitute tofu and guacamole. You will need speak Spanish to request changes. Has Wi-Fi. Sometime closes early.
